languages.text: "Сизый, ну ты это. Поэт наш. Зачем тебе небо? С нашего потолка вода не льет, молнии не бьют — хорошо живем, слава Императору!"
"Listen here, Master Poet. What are you wasting time thinking about the sky for? Our ceiling don't leak water, it don't shoot lightning — life's good, Smokey, Emperor be praised!"
languages.original_text: "Сизый, ну ты это. Поэт наш. Зачем тебе небо? С нашего потолка вода не льет, молнии не бьют — хорошо живем, слава Императору!"

traits.locale_text: "Smokey, listen. You're our poet. Why are you hung up on the sky? Our ceiling doesn't leak water, doesn't shoot lightning — all is well in our life, thank the Emperor!"
"Smokey, listen. You're our poet. Why are you hung up on the sky? Our ceiling doesn't leak water, doesn't shoot lightning — all is well in our life, thank the Emperor!"
"Listen here, Master Poet. What are you wasting time thinking about the sky for? Our ceiling don't leak water, it don't shoot lightning — life's good, thank the Emperor!"
"Listen here, Master Poet. What are you wasting time thinking about the sky for? Our ceiling don't leak water, it don't shoot lightning — life's good, thank the Emperor!"
"Listen here, Master Poet. What are you wasting time thinking about the sky for? Our ceiling don't leak water, it don't shoot lightning — life's good, Smokey, Emperor be praised!"

languages.text: “我说，诗人先生。你干嘛要浪费时间，思考天空是什么样子的？我们的天花板不会漏水，也不会射出闪电。人生很美好，斯莫奇！赞美帝皇吧！”
languages.original_text: "Listen here, Master Poet. What are you wasting time thinking about the sky for? Our ceiling don't leak water, it don't shoot lightning — life's good, Smokey, Emperor be praised!"

traits.locale_text: “我说，诗人先生。你干嘛要浪费时间，思考天空是什么样子的？我们的天花板不会漏水，也不会射出闪电。人生很美好，斯莫奇！赞美帝皇吧！”

languages.text: «Escúchame, poeta. ¿Por qué pierdes el tiempo pensando cómo será el cielo? Nuestro techo ni echa agua, ni nos dispara rayos; ¡la vida aquí es buena, Humo, gracias al Emperador!».
languages.original_text: "Listen here, Master Poet. What are you wasting time thinking about the sky for? Our ceiling don't leak water, it don't shoot lightning — life's good, Smokey, Emperor be praised!"

traits.locale_text: «Escúchame, poeta. ¿Por qué pierdes el tiempo pensando cómo será el cielo? Nuestro techo ni echa agua, ni nos dispara rayos; ¡la vida aquí es buena, Humo, gracias al Emperador!».

languages.text: 「いいか聞け、詩人先生。どうして空のことを考えて時間を無駄にする？この天井は水を降らさないし、雷も落ちない…悪くない人生だろ、スモーキー。皇帝を讃えよ！」
languages.original_text: "Listen here, Master Poet. What are you wasting time thinking about the sky for? Our ceiling don't leak water, it don't shoot lightning — life's good, Smokey, Emperor be praised!"

traits.locale_text: 「いいか聞け、詩人先生。どうして空のことを考えて時間を無駄にする？この天井は水を降らさないし、雷も落ちない…悪くない人生だろ、スモーキー。皇帝を讃えよ！」

languages.text: "Hört mal her, verehrter Poet. Was vergeudet Ihr Zeit mit Gedanken über den Himmel? Durch unsere Decke dringt kein Wasser, sie verschießt keine Blitze – das Leben ist schön, Smokey, dem Imperator sei Dank!"
languages.original_text: "Listen here, Master Poet. What are you wasting time thinking about the sky for? Our ceiling don't leak water, it don't shoot lightning — life's good, Smokey, Emperor be praised!"

traits.locale_text: "Hört mal her, verehrter Poet. Was vergeudet Ihr Zeit mit Gedanken über den Himmel? Durch unsere Decke dringt kein Wasser, sie verschießt keine Blitze – das Leben ist schön, Smokey, dem Imperator sei Dank!"

languages.text: « Écoute-moi bien, le poète. Pourquoi tu perds ton temps à réfléchir au ciel ? Notre plafond crache pas de l'eau, il lance pas des éclairs... On a la belle vie, Smokey, loué soit l'Empereur ! »
languages.original_text: "Listen here, Master Poet. What are you wasting time thinking about the sky for? Our ceiling don't leak water, it don't shoot lightning — life's good, Smokey, Emperor be praised!"

traits.locale_text: « Écoute-moi bien, le poète. Pourquoi tu perds ton temps à réfléchir au ciel ? Notre plafond crache pas de l'eau, il lance pas des éclairs... On a la belle vie, Smokey, loué soit l'Empereur ! »

languages.text: "Kulaklarını iyice aç Şair Efendi. Gökyüzünü düşünüp zamanını ne diye boşa harcıyorsun? Çatımız su akıtmıyor, yıldırım çarpmıyor. Hayat güzel Smokey, İmparator'a şükret!"
languages.original_text: "Listen here, Master Poet. What are you wasting time thinking about the sky for? Our ceiling don't leak water, it don't shoot lightning — life's good, Smokey, Emperor be praised!"

traits.locale_text: "Kulaklarını iyice aç Üstat Şair. Gökyüzünü düşünüp zamanını ne diye boşa harcıyorsun? Çatımız su akıtmıyor, yıldırım çarpmıyor. Hayat güzel Smokey, İmparator'a şükret!"
